document_title: Carotid artery stenosis: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Carotid artery stenosis has few characteristic signs, so screening to detect the disease early plays a key role, thereby monitoring and having effective treatment and intervention strategies to prevent stroke.
According to Dr. Nguyen Anh Dung, regular health checks and screening for cardiovascular diseases are necessary for each person to prevent disease. This is even more necessary for people with high risk factors.
Accordingly, people over 50 years old, with high blood pressure, dyslipidemia, smokers, diabetes, obesity, people with a sedentary lifestyle, etc., even without symptoms, still need regular check-ups and cardiovascular disease screening.
For patients with carotid artery stenosis who suddenly develop symptoms such as distorted mouth, paralysis of one side of the body or only one arm/leg, difficulty speaking or not being able to speak, loss of vision on one side, balance disorders... emergency treatment is required. right at hospitals and specialized stroke treatment facilities with vascular intervention so that doctors can diagnose and prescribe appropriate treatment.
Heart Center, Tam Anh General Hospital brings together a team of leading experts, possessing a modern machinery system that can screen and early diagnose carotid artery stenosis and cardiovascular diseases for all subjects, from Pregnant women, infants, children, adults, and the elderly:
768-slice CT scanner applies artificial intelligence, scanning the whole body in just 3 to 4 seconds;; Advanced magnetic resonance imaging machine to scan the heart without holding your breath;; New generation echocardiography, vascular ultrasound (carotid artery, peripheral blood vessels...) creates 4D images to survey heart volume and function...; 12-lead ECG machine
Tam Anh General Hospital also applies modern methods in the treatment of carotid artery stenosis, helping to reduce the risk of recurrent stroke and improve the quality of life for patients.
